data.title: Manisha Koirala believes it's nice to have a 'companion' in life
data.meta_description: Manisha Koirala opened up about her plans to find love again after divorce. The veteran Bollywood actress was married to Nepali businessman Samrat Dahal. However, the two parted ways in 2012.Now,...
data.text:
Manisha Koirala opened up about her plans to find love again after divorce.

The veteran Bollywood actress was married to Nepali businessman Samrat Dahal. However, the two parted ways in 2012.

Now, the actress talked about the charm of having a life partner in one's life during the promotions of her upcoming Sanjay Leela Bhansali’s Netflix web series Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar.

In conversation with Zoom, Manisha said, ". I definitely feel as if there was a male figure in my life, if there was a partner in my life, probably, it’ll be nice to have that."

She added, "But I have to be very honest life... I am living a full life (I am not waiting for him or wasting my time on that. If it is meant to be, it will be, or else, I am content with my life)."

The Dil Se.. actress further said, "I have a very peaceful and loving family support. I've got a great brother and sister-in-law, great parents and good and loving friends and people."

She continued, "Other than that, work is going great. I enjoy travelling; there's no financial crunch by God's grace. So, I am in a very good space. I feel complete with myself – mentally, emotionally and physically, in every way."
